feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Typo in common schedule text by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17325
  • chore: Add scheduler first name to event title by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17309
  • feat: display number of rows in routing form reporting by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17334
  • fix: give reason to reassign - allow team members to reassign even if busy by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17328
  • fix: Revert "fix: use UTC date in tasker" by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17341
  • chore: Add search ability to the people filter within insights by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17320
  • fix: Tasker new Date is fixed to lambda lifetime by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17342
  • chore: Add ./components/[name]/index.ts map to package.json by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17319
  • feat: add workflow vars and search for event types by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17343
  • chore: v4.6.12 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17345

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.11...v4.6.12

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Wrong attendee details are showing for the seated event by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17338
  • fix: lint errors in app by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17351
  • docs: AvailabilitySettings toggle animation fix by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17355
  • docs: platform api calls by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17356
  • fix: Inconsistent phrasing and remove duplicate words in localization by @AliPythonDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17339
  • fix: Resolve lint errors by updating RerouteDialog.test.tsx by @mavishay in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17352
  • feat: Salesforce RR Skip Accounts - Match On Email Domain by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17350
  • chore: v4.6.13 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17362

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.12...v4.6.13

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17231
  • fix: few ui fixes on booking page by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17383
  • chore: ensure idempotency cancel booking api v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17385
  • chore: add logs api-v2 booking controllers by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17389
  • chore: settings/admin - remove pages router and use app router & add i18n to metadata by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16773
  • fix: virtualised member list for reassign by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17386
  • feat: Salesforce change owner on booking [CAL-4641] by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17391
  • fix: round robin re assignment google meet bug by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17378
  • feat: Prioritize Contacts Over Leads If They Exist [CAL-4640] by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17380
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17393
  • chore: v4.6.14 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17390

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.13...v4.6.14

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • perf: Sentry perf tracing by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17202
  • chore: ensure idempotency cancel booking api v2 (revert) by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17407
  • fix: main google calendar not being connected by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17404
  • fix: stripe connect atom for teams by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17294
  • perf: Add ability to configure Sentry maxSpans by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17411
  • perf: Reduce spans in highPerf temporarily by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17413
  • fix: huddle01 is not generating meeting link by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17417
  • fix: buffers in handleNewBooking by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17415
  • feat: payment card atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17203
  • perf: Allow configuring Sentry:debug by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17420
  • fix: add reassignedBy and reassign reason to both status by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17418
  • fix: booker platform atom multi duration selector by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17419
  • fix: routing-forms reporting - "in" operator logic is broken + overall refactor by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17398
  • fix: people filter in /bookings and create OOO modal by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17396
  • feat: Send Attendee No Show Data To Salesforce by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17423
  • feat: Support Attribute Logic fallback by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17290
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17421
  • feat: Salesforce only get active users by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17426
  • perf: Cache app store imports by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17425
  • chore: Release v4.6.15 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17422

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.14...v4.6.15

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • revert: "perf: Cache app store imports (#17425)" by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17428
  • fix: no availability email frequency fix by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17430
  • fix: update profile photo logic in google cal integration by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17438
  • perf: google cal profile photo by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17441
  • fix: create a wrapper for google calendar fetching by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17440
  • perf: Add more specific spans to getBusyTimes by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17437
  • fix: docs mdx syntax errors by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17450
  • fix: payments tab typo for platform by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17451
  • fix: filter by team url by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17456
  • feat: allow users to generate csv tables for org members by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17458
  • chore: remove no option text by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17457
  • fix: ensure fetching all members before exporting csv by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17461
  • perf: Remove extra spans by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17464
  • chore: v4.6.16 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17465

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.15...v4.6.16
